name: Pogo-Gogo
description:
A game about pogoing up skyscrapers. An important message is waiting for you at the top of the tallest building, but there may be even more climbing to do after that. Make hilarious fails, unbelievable saves, or just explore the tiny open world and its inhabitants. There are 100 purple crystals scattered around the town and some are hiding in the most unsuspecting places.

Available to play on both controller or keyboard/mouse.
